3D printing Workshop Quentin Geissmann 21/02/2019 Prerequisites Create and onshape acount. Onshape is a free online software for Computer-Aided Design Install Cura on your computer. Cura “prepares” your 3D file for our specific model of printer (Ultimaker 3).

Mordern vs Primitive 3D printing Modern Primitive An evolution not a revolution

Mordern vs Primitive 3D printing Modern "Fused filament fabrication" printing works by depositing a melted polumer filament onto successive layers Primitive “Coiling” is a widespread primitive technology whereby a potters extrudes successive coils of clay to build a volume An evolution not a revolution Both “additive”" and “substractive” manufacturing have been around since the dawn of time. 3D printing is just another tool amongst a large collection.
